CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 In chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution , PIDT - EHNT showed an absorption maximum at 599 nm and a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm ; when changing the branched 2ethylhexyl to linear hexyl side chain , the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm , respectively , which may due to the reduced steric hindrance of the linear side chain.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Chlorobenzene (CB)
2. PIDT-EHNT
3. PIDT-DTNT

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* Chlorobenzene (CB)
* PIDT-EHNT
* PIDT-DTNT
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PIDT-EHNT
2. PIDT-DTNT

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* PIDT-EHNT
* PIDT-DTNT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-EHNT |
| PIDT-DTNT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 In chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution , PIDT - EHNT showed an absorption maximum at 599 nm and a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm ; when changing the branched 2ethylhexyl to linear hexyl side chain , the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm , respectively , which may due to the reduced steric hindrance of the linear side chain.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. absorption maximum
2. peak
3. bathochromic shift
4. steric hindrance

These are all properties or characteristics of the polymers being described, rather than the polymers themselves.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property:

1. absorption maximum
2. peak
3. bathochromic shift

These three entities are all related to the optical properties of the polymers being described and can be used to characterize their behavior in different ways.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities from the paragraph, presented in the same words as in the original text:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption maximum |
| peak |
| bathochromic shift |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 In chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution , PIDT - EHNT showed an absorption maximum at 599 nm and a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm ; when changing the branched 2ethylhexyl to linear hexyl side chain , the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm , respectively , which may due to the reduced steric hindrance of the linear side chain.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's break down the paragraph and identify the entities related to "Property Value" one by one:

1. "599 nm" - This is a property value, specifically the wavelength of the absorption maximum of PIDT-EHNT in chlorobenzene (CB) solution.
2. "433 nm" - This is also a property value, specifically the wavelength of the slightly weaker peak of PIDT-EHNT in chlorobenzene (CB) solution.
3. "608 nm" - This is a property value, specifically the wavelength of the absorption maximum of PIDT-DTNT in chlorobenzene (CB) solution, which is a slightly bathochromic shift compared to PIDT-EHNT.
4. "439 nm" - This is a property value, specifically the wavelength of the corresponding peak of PIDT-DTNT in chlorobenzene (CB) solution, which is also a slightly bathochromic shift compared to PIDT-EHNT.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* 599 nm
* 433 nm
* 608 nm
* 439 nm
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

* 599 nm
* 433 nm
* 608 nm
* 439 nm

These are the wavelengths of the absorption maxima and peaks of the polymers PIDT-EHNT and PIDT-DTNT in chlorobenzene (CB) solution, which are properties of the materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities presented as a Property Value column:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 599 nm |
| 433 nm |
| 608 nm |
| 439 nm |

These are the wavelengths of the absorption maxima and peaks of the polymers PIDT-EHNT and PIDT-DTNT in chlorobenzene (CB) solution, which are properties of the materials.
